description: We sit down with Squanch Games Chief Creative Officer Mikey Spano and Chief Design Officer Erich Meyr to discuss the art of making a comedy game sequel as they put the finishing touches on High on Life 2, which will be released on February 13, 2026 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S – including launching on day one into Xbox Game Pass.

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: World of Warcraft players have discovered a trick that makes their houses float in the air, which a number of people have used to make wild flying creations. Better yet, instead of patching it out, Blizzard has surprisingly given its blessing for airborne abodes.

description: The Last of Us TV show is getting a few Funko Pop figures. Joel, Ellie, Tommy, and clicker figures are available to preorder and set to be released on February 4.

description: IGN recently chatted with Justin Theroux about Fallout: Season 2, his particular interpretation of Robert House, and the choices he made in bringing this iconic video game character to life: "He thinks that what he's probably doing is good for humanity writ large, to shake the Etch A Sketch and start the world over again."
